Detailed Description

This is an implementation for TerrainHoleMap for the second generation of terrain.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

TerrainHoleMap1::TerrainHoleMap1 ( CommonTerrainBlock1 &  block  )  [explicit]

This is the TerrainHoleMap1 default constructor.

This represents terrain without holes.

Parameters:
block The block that the holes are for.
